body.name: Dash Cam 2K, KAWA WiFi Dash Camera for Cars 1440P with Hand-Free Voice Control, Night Vision, Mini Hidden Dashcam Front, Emergency Lock, Loop Recording, 24-Hour Parking Monitor, APP, Support 256GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 39 mins
features: 【Enhance 2K 1440P & Wide Angle】KAWA wifi dash cam features a super-high resolution of 1440P (2 times clearer than most 1080P dash cams), capturing license plates, road signs, pedestrians, and other details on the road. With 145°wide-angle, this dash cam enables you to monitor more lanes without blind spots.

【Starlight Color Night Vision】With a 6 Full HD spherical glass lens, our 2K dash camera features industry-leading Starlight Color Night Vision for clear images and videos even in low-light environments at night, without auxiliary light sources. KAWA mini dash cam with compact and hidden design make sure it will never block your view. You can drive smoothly day and night.

【3D-Sensor & Emergency Recording】This dash camera for cars built-in 3D-sensor which is more smarter to judge the vehicle collision than normal G-Sensor. It will automatically record an emergency video when shock occurs. And this video will not be looped video coverage, which helps you to obtain accurate evidence videos at any time.

【Hands-Free Voice Control】 This dashcams for cars saves the current picture and record an emergency video by directly giving voice commands. Hands-free voice control allows you to focus more on driving safety and quickly complete your request.

【Loop Recording & Wi-Fi & App Control】The recorded videos can be automatically saved and stored locally on a micro SD memory card up to 256GB (not included) while driving. With built-in WiFi, it can connect to the KAWA App, which simply enables you to watch real-time footage, play recorded videos as well as download files to your phone.

【24H Parking Monitoring】Features time-lapse recording and collision sensor to achieve 24 hours parking monitoring, all-round protection of your car safety. (Parking monitoring cable sales separately, ASIN: B0BKPKV72H)
【Service】We provide a lifetime warranty service for the car dash cam, and free replacement within 18 months. All emails and messages will be answered within 24 hours.

Do you have to reconnect the dash cam to your phone every time i get in the car? After you finished the first connection, the dash cam will continue to record just by turning on the car without connecting through the app every time. it will record on your sd card. What if I keep getting low speed card alerts? Our products detect a low-speed card and prompt you to replace the micro sd card to prevent video loss or reduced frame rate. We kindly recommend Kingston, Sandisk. You can buy it on Amazon. Or our KAWA micro sd card. ASIN: B0BNPKSJMX. How to activate this dash cam's parking monitoring? KAWA D6 supports 24-hour recording when connected to the parking monitoring cable (not included in the package). If parking monitoring function is required, please purchase another parking cable and connect the hardwire kit to your fuse box. How does the dash cam format the memory card? After the APP is successfully connected, enter the real-time interface, click the setting button in the upper right corner, select Micro SD Card Manage, and then select Formatting to format. Or, click the Power Key three times. Why can't I see the recorded video in the album? 1. Go to the Home page in KAWA DVR 2. click into the dash cam and you will be the live video page 3. check the button below the video, you will see an Album and Take Photo button 4. Click into the Album, you will see the videos and photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dash Cam that doesn't break the bank.
reviews.reviewText: I'll keep this short, as most reviewers have highlighted the pros and cons. This is a decent dash cam with good clarity and quick boot-up time. Installation took less than 10 min. I'm planning to purchase another one, but the more expensive version. Overall, great dash cam for 40 dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For price very good quality
reviews.reviewText: This was simple to set up it did require a brand new SD card. The older one I used wouldn't format. This has been working really well for 3 months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advetised
reviews.reviewText: It seems to do everything that it supposed to do. Easy to figure out and I like being able to download clips to my phone immediately as opposed to taking out the memory card and putting it in a computer. The only thing I would have liked to see would have been some clips or something to help hang the wire. I don't have a space to tuck the wire into around my windshield. I am also waiting to see how well it stays on the windshield with the heat from southern US beating down on it. The heat has destroyed or demounted many other dash cams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value - Great Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: Dash cam is replacing my older Goluk ( that was a great camera - app not supported anymore!) I was able to use the existing power cable (micro usb - not the C type like most) Voice commands are great ( you cannot use them when app is open )- multi function power button for features (off, format card, etc ) Air venting is great for these cameras - they get very warm. Female voice prompts easy to understand. Clear pics. Good, basic dash cam without all the obstruction of bigger units cluttering up the windshield (why the need for monitors?) Hope this holds up - I will update after longer use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smile, You're on my Camera
reviews.reviewText: this was easy to install and took more time for the app to download than the set up . it talks. Love all the features and feeling more secure that I have this small camera to record my every move and those cars around me. great resolution in case footage is needed for who was at fault,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it. The quality is impeccable and it automatically starts recording emergency videos when it senses a loud thomp. The only thing I don't like is that you cant see the videos unless your camera is turned on. So if you are home and you want to erase videos to make space you cant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's a keeper
reviews.reviewText: After trying repeatedly, reading and rereading the instructions, and watching the useless video twice I gave up. Three emails over the last eight days and not one answered by kawa. My advice...skip this one,update:I am upgrading to four stars. I initially was going to return because you get no customer service from this company but decided to keep it. After three weeks and numerous attempts it finally connected. Don't know how or why but it did. I put it in my wife's car not expecting much but, amazingly, everything works as it should and the video quality is amazing. Take a chance if you will, I'm happy with it now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get what you paid for
reviews.reviewText: It an ok dash cam. The app is a little annoying but other then that it record great. Just trying to access the video takes a while.
Such a nice camera, good quality video and easy to install. Not much to say, it’s a dash camera, it works well. 👍🏻👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Does exactly what I need it to.
reviews.reviewText: Simple install and set-up, video quality is great, voice controls work well. A good dash cam for a very reasonable price.
Clarity, function, construction... all good. I needed a windshield replacement. Couldn't get it remounted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really impressed with this and how it links to your phone
